item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Classic' - a book which people praise and don't read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you are going through hell, keep going." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by The Dalai Lama
item.description: "If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito." -- The Dalai Lama

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I have great faith in fools - self-confidence my friends will call it." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?" -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "I can never read all the books I want; I can never be all the people I want and live all the lives I want. I can never train myself in all the skills I want. And why do I want? I want to live and feel all the shades, tones and variations of mental and physical experience possible in life. And I am horribly limited." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "I like too many things and get all confused and hung-up running from one falling star to another till i drop. This is the night, what it does to you. I had nothing to offer anybody except my own confusion." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Tomorrow may be hell, but today was a good writing day, and on the good writing days nothing else matters." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Mohd Jayzuan add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer
